DOC.brief_summary: Intraoperative fluorescent cholangiography ( IFC ) concomitant fluorescent angiography recently develop method non-invasive visualisation relevant anatomy laparoscopic cholecystectomy . The objective study assess time require routine-use IFC evaluate success-rate procedure . Methods Thirty-five patient schedule laparoscopic cholecystectomy operate surgeon consecutively enrol . A standardized protocol IFC include concomitant angiography perform laparoscopic cholecystectomy . Intra-operative time-registration exposure predefined anatomical structure record .
DOC.brief_title: Promising Initial Experience With Intra-operative Fluorescent Cholangiography
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Age > 18 year Scheduled acute elective laparoscopic cholecystectomy Informed consent Exclusion criterion : Known iodinehypersensitivity Liver renal insufficiency Known thyrotoxicosis Pregnancy lactation
